body: @narcowalrus To be quite honest, I don't even remember commenting that.  And I don't think I wrote that to diminish anyone. It's just a stupid statement that I wrote more than one year ago. In fact, I found that doujin quite cute as well. I like those cute romances even though they don't usually portrait believable human beings. It's just porn. No need to get all worked up, dude.

@thedrunkone It may just be porn, but how can you act like this on here, but act so callously on here: https://nhentai.net/g/244885/ What exactly did you get out of bringing people down like that? That wasn't cool.

@thedrunkone Even though it's a women that definitely doesn't exist in real life? You said it yourself, remember? "And that concludes another episode of "Women That Definetly Don't Exist in Real Life". Have sweet dreams and fuck you."
